name: Beautifly
flavor_text: It has an aggressive nature. It stabs prey with its long, narrow mouth to drain the prey’s fluids.

attacks.name: Skill Dive
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Butterfly Edge
attacks.effect: If your opponent’s Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from this attack, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokémon during your opponent’s next turn.
